DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine percentage patient would reach cholesterol goal atorvastatin treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Efficacy Of Atorvastatin In Lowering Cholesterol In Latin American Patients With High Cholesterol
DOC.criteria: Patients high cholesterol eligible treatment baseline LDLC level less equal 220 mg/dL Willingness follow diet Triglycerides le equal 400 mg/dL Hemoglobin A1c > 10 %
